Name: Emmons
Fate: Sunk by the USS Ellyson on 7 April 1945 after suffering five hits from Kamikaze aircraft on the afternoon of 6 April 1945.
Armament:
4 × 5 in (127 mm) DP guns, 
6 × 0.5 in (12.7 mm) guns,
6 × 20 mm AA guns,
10 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes,
6 × depth charge projectors,
2 × depth charge tracks
